name: subscribo/apiclientcommon
description: Package API Client Common contain functionality shared by API Client packages

suggest.laravel/framework: This package have been developed to work with The Laravel Framework 5.0
suggest.illuminate/foundation: If QuestionaryController, QuestionaryControllerTrait or ApiClientCommonServiceProvider::registerRoutes() is used (recommended version ~5.0)
suggest.illuminate/http: If QuestionaryController, QuestionaryControllerTrait or ApiClientCommonServiceProvider::registerRoutes() is used (recommended version ~5.0)
